job_description.title: Growth Marketing Manager
job_description.description:
We're hiring a Growth Marketing Manager to own our demand generation strategy. You'll be responsible for driving qualified leads through SEO, content marketing, paid channels, and email campaigns.

This role reports directly to the CMO and works cross-functionally with Sales, Product, and Design. You'll have budget autonomy ($15k/month) and ownership of our marketing tech stack. Success means hitting MQL targets and improving lead quality (not just volume).

other_requirements: Proven track record of hitting lead targets

responsibilities: Manage paid advertising campaigns (Google, LinkedIn, Reddit)
Develop SEO strategy and create high-quality content
Build and optimize email nurture campaigns
Analyze funnel metrics and optimize conversion rates
Collaborate with Sales on lead quality and handoff process

evaluation_context.notes: High Capability (25%) because we need someone who can execute independently. High Reward (20%) because marketing directly impacts revenue. Cultural Fit important (15%) for cross-functional collaboration. Lower Career Trajectory (5%) because we're hiring for current skill level, not just potential.
